ingredients.ingredient: 2 (1/2 inch thick) slices soft French bread
2 tablespoons semi-sweet chocolate chips, or more to taste

cookingTips: Butter bread on outside surfaces only for even browning and crispness
Use low heat to melt chocolate gently without burning the bread exterior
Watch carefully as dessert sandwiches cook quickly and can burn in moments
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user how to create a grilled dessert with caramelized bread and melted chocolate that balances crunch and creaminess.
